About

Games

Modeling

Game Design / VR / Modeling

Xander Thornborough is a VR designer and 3D artist based in Queens, New York.

His interests are focused the potential of playful experiences to act as a means of education, as well as a personal interest in Korean history.

He is majoring in Design & Technology at Parsons School of Design with a focus on VR, digital interaction, and game design. He is set to graduate in May 2022.

    Invited to meet with South Korea's minister of culture.
